plot_combinations¶

gwasr.utils.plot_utils.plot_combinations(plot_channels, ias, predictors, target_channel_name, gps1, samp_freq, out_path, save_ext='png', thr=-1.0)¶

Plot sum of more instantaneous amplitudes and the predictor.

Parameters
plot_channelslist of str

channels names

iasnumpy array

imf instantaneous amplitudes matrix

predictorsnumpy array

predictors matrix

target_channel_namestr

name of the channel from which ias are computed

gps1int

gps of the event

samp_freqfloat

sampling frequency

out_pathstr

save path

save_extstr

plot extension

thrfloat

correlation threshold for plots

plot_imf

Next topic

plot_omegagram_download
